name: DailyGrind
description:
Made for the one button game jam 2022

Run your own coffee shop. Grind beans, brew coffee, steam milk, and try to keep your customers happy by filling their orders quickly. The more orders you fill the more popular your shop will become making the orders come in faster and faster. 

tap spacebar: to move the direction your character is looking

hold spacebar: to use machines or pick up/putdown items
